amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 2702, the prohibition on conducting an additional round of Base Realignment and Closure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to strike section 2702, the prohibition on conducting an additional round of Base Realignment and Closure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 248 (Roll no. 365).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 248 (Roll no. 365).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. McClintock.
